markdownRemark.html:
Allias is a command line tool for quickly defining and managing terminal aliases. It provides an interactive CLI interface that is easy to use and intuitive to understand.

Get started by installing allias by running

$ npm i -g allias

then start allias at any location to get started:

$ allias
